entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:07 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangiqsujuaq Airport 12:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -46

Wind: WNW 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 31. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 31. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 51 in the evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
